command_toggle_checking.description: Tooltip for toolbar button when checking for updates.

content_copied_entry.description: Overlay shown after copying an entry to the clipboard.

content_copied_fields.description: Overlay shown after copying entry as a tab-delimited fields to the clipboard.

content_copied_word.description: Overlay shown after copying a word to the clipboard.

content_copy_error.description: Message shown in overlay when we couldn't copy to the clipboard

content_copy_keys_entry_label.description: Label for key to copy a dictionary entry to the clipboard

content_copy_keys_fields_label.description: Label for key to copy a tab-separated set of fields to the clipboard

content_copy_keys_kanji_label.description: Label for key to copy a single kanji character to the clipboard

content_copy_keys_label.description: Label at start of row describing keys for copying information to the clipboard

content_copy_keys_next_label.description: Label for key to move the copy highlight to the next entry

content_copy_keys_word_label.description: Label for key to copy a word to the clipboard

content_copy_overlay_copy_title.description: Title shown at the top of the copy overlay when we can't find the word to copy.

content_copy_overlay_copy_title_with_wor.description: Title shown at the top of the copy overlay. It includes the matching headwords / kanji

content_copy_overlay_entry_button.description: Label for the button to copy an entire entry

content_copy_overlay_kanji_button.description: Fallback label used for the button to copy a kanji character when we fail to look up the kanji

content_copy_overlay_tab_separated_butto.description: Label for the button to copy an entry with fields separated by tabs

content_copy_overlay_word_button.description: Fallback label used for the button to copy a word when we fail to look up the word

content_database_updating.description: Status bar message shown while the dictionary is being updated and only a snapshot can be shown.

options_browser_commands_no_toggle_key.description: Descriptive text used for other browsers which do not permit configuring extension keys from the extension itself.

options_data_source.description: Attribute of source data. The strings 'JMdict/EDICT', 'KANJIDIC' and 'JMnedict/ENAMDICT' must appear so that they can be link-ified to the corresponding project home pages.

options_database_initializing.description: Label when IndexedDB is being initialized

options_db_update_error.description: Label when we failed to update the data for some reason

options_db_update_next_retry.description: Label used when there is a scheduled retry

options_db_update_quota_error.description: Label when we failed to update the data for some reason
options_db_update_quota_error.message: 磁盘空间不足。（大约有 $quota$ 可用空间）

quota.example: The amount of disk space available, formatted as a file size.

options_downloading_data.description: Label while we are downloading updates

options_edrdg_license.description: Description of license terms. The keywords 'Electronic Dictionary Research and Development Group' and options_edrdg_license_keyword must appear so they can be linkified. IT SHOULD BEGIN WITH APPROPRIATE SPACE IN LANGUAGES THAT SEPARATE SENTENCES WITH WHITESPACE.
options_edrdg_license.message: 这些资料的所有权属于电子词典研究与开发小组（Electronic Dictionary Research and Development Group），10ten reader 在 EDRDG 的许可协议的约束下使用它们。

options_edrdg_license_keyword.description: The keyword in options_edrdg_license to link to the license

options_highlight_style_label.description: Title for the section for selection the highlight color

options_kanji_components.description: Option to define if radicals are displayed or not

options_kanji_data_name.description: The name for the kanji database data set

options_kanji_data_title.description: The kanji data series title and version

options_kanji_dictionary_heading.description: Heading for options to configure what information is displayed from the kanji dictionary

options_keyboard_heading.description: Heading for options to configure keyboard commands

options_lang_kanji_only.decsription: Annotation added to language labels for languages where only the kanji data has been translated (i.e. but not the word data)

options_lang_warning_always_en.message: 单词释义的英语版会固定显示。

options_lang_warning_change_lang_redownl.message: 更改语言时会重新下载数据文件。

options_lang_warning_names_en_only.message: 名字词典仅有英语版可用。

options_lang_warning_other_lang_when_ava.message: 除英语以外的单词释义仅在可用时显示。

options_lang_warning_temporary_en_fallba.message: 单词释义数据更新期间，可能会临时使用英语版的数据。

options_lang_words_only.decsription: Annotation added to language labels for languages where only the word data has been translated (i.e. but not the kanji data)

options_last_database_check.description: Status to show when we last checked for an update

options_lookup_puck_heading.description: Heading for the section containing options controlling the lookup puck used on touch devices
options_lookup_puck_heading.message: 用于触摸屏的圆形按钮

options_mouse_interactivity_label.description: Label for section for enabling mouse/touch interactivity in the popup

options_mouse_onboarding_learn_mode.descripion: Text for the link to the mouse onboarding page

options_name_data_name.description: The name for the name database data set

options_name_data_title.description: The name data series title and version

options_new_badge_text.description: Text on the little badges highlighting new settings

options_no_database.description: Label when the database has not yet been downloaded

options_offline_explanation.description: Message shown when the system is offline so updates cannot be performed
options_offline_explanation.message: 无法检查更新，因为没有连接到互联网。一旦设备联网，10ten reader 会再次检查更新。

options_popup_copy_fields.message: 复制以制表符分隔的内容

options_popup_interactivity_heading.description: Heading for the section for configuring popup interactivity features

options_popup_kanji_lookup.description: Label for the key to force looking up the kanji dictionary only

options_popup_move_popup_down_or_up.description: Note that it is important that down comes before up

options_popup_style_heading.description: Heading for options to configure popup display

options_pos_display_code.description: Label for simply display dictionary part-of-speech codes

options_pos_display_expl.description: Label for configuring short explanations to be shown for part-of-speech. The "-ru Godan/u-verb" example should correspond to the localized value of pos_label_v5r.

options_pos_display_label.description: Label for the drop-down list used to configure how part-of-speech tags are displayed

options_show_context_menu_item.description: Option to enable context menu item with label `menu_enable_extension`
options_show_context_menu_item.message: 右键菜单中添加“启用 10ten reader”

options_show_popup_explanation.message: 选择以下键时，按住键并将鼠标悬停在目标内容上以显示弹出窗口。

options_show_priority.description: Label for enabling the ★ and ☆ markers next to dictionary headwords to indicate they occur frequently  or somewhat frequently respectively
options_show_priority.message: 显示高频率（★）和较高频率（☆）的标志

options_show_puck_label.description: Leading text for options for when to display the puck

options_show_puck_option_auto.description: Option to have 10ten automatically determine when to show the puck

options_show_puck_option_hide.description: Option to always hide the puck

options_show_puck_option_show.description: Option to always show the puck

options_tab_position_label.description: Heading for the radio buttons to choose the popup tab position

options_tab_position_left.description: Text label for the radio button to show tabs on the right

options_tab_position_none.description: Text label for the radio button to hide tabs

options_tab_position_right.description: Text label for the radio button to show tabs on the right

options_tab_position_top.description: Text label for the radio button to show tabs on top

options_toolbar_icon_default_alt.description: Alt text for the default toolbar icon

options_toolbar_icon_label.description: Heading for the radio buttons to choose the toolbar icon

options_toolbar_icon_sky_alt.description: Alt text for the 天 toolbar icon

options_update_check_button_label.description: Label for the button to check for database updates

options_update_retry_button_label.description: Label for the button to retry the database update after a failure

options_updated_badge_text.description: Text on the little badges highlighting updated settings

options_words_data_name.description: The name for the words database data set

options_words_data_title.description: The word data series title and version

popup_close_label.description: The aria-label associated with the button to close the popup

popup_pin_label.description: The aria-label associated with the button to pin the popup

popup_settings_label.description: The aria-label associated with the button to open the settings panel from the popup

pos_label_adj_f.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to noun or verb entries acting prenominally

pos_label_adj_i.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to adjective (keiyoushi) entries

pos_label_adj_ix.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to adjective (keiyoushi) - yoi/ii class entries

pos_label_adj_kari.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to 'kari' adjective (archaic) entries

pos_label_adj_ku.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to 'ku' adjective (archaic) entries

pos_label_adj_na.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to adjectival nouns or quasi-adjectives (keiyodoshi) entries

pos_label_adj_nari.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to archaic/formal form of na-adjective entries

pos_label_adj_no.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no' entries

pos_label_adj_pn.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to pre-noun adjectival (rentaishi) entries

pos_label_adj_shiku.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to 'shiku' adjective (archaic) entries

pos_label_adj_t.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to 'taru' adjective entries

pos_label_adv.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to adverb (fukushi) entries

pos_label_adv_to.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to adverb taking the 'to' particle entries

pos_label_aux.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to auxiliary entries

pos_label_aux_adj.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to auxiliary adjective entries

pos_label_aux_v.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to auxiliary verb entries

pos_label_conj.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to conjunction entries

pos_label_cop.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to copula entries

pos_label_ctr.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to counter entries

pos_label_exp.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to expressions (phrases, clauses, etc.) entries

pos_label_int.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to interjection (kandoushi) entries

pos_label_n.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to noun (common) (futsuumeishi) entries

pos_label_n_adv.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to adverbial noun (fukushitekimeishi) entries

pos_label_n_pr.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to proper noun entries

pos_label_n_pref.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to noun, used as a prefix entries

pos_label_n_suf.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to noun, used as a suffix entries

pos_label_n_t.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to noun (temporal) (jisoumeishi) entries

pos_label_num.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to numeric entries

pos_label_pn.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to pronoun entries

pos_label_pref.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to prefix entries

pos_label_prt.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to particle entries

pos_label_suf.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to suffix entries

pos_label_unc.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to unclassified entries

pos_label_v1.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Ichidan verb entries

pos_label_v1_s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Ichidan verb - kureru special class entries

pos_label_v2a_s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Nidan verb with 'u' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v2b_k.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Nidan verb (upper class) with 'bu' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v5aru.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb - -aru special class entries

pos_label_v5g.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb with 'gu' ending entries

pos_label_v5k.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb with 'ku' ending entries

pos_label_v5m.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb with 'mu' ending entries

pos_label_v5n.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb with 'nu' ending entries

pos_label_v5r.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb with 'ru' ending entries

pos_label_v5s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb with 'su' ending entries

pos_label_v5uru.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb - Uru old class verb (old form of Eru) entries (this doesn't appear to be used)

pos_label_v_unspec.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to verb unspecified entries

pos_label_vi.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to intransitive verb entries

pos_label_vk.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Kuru verb - special class entries

pos_label_vn.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to irregular nu verb entries

pos_label_vr.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to irregular ru verb, plain form ends with -ri entries

pos_label_vs.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru entries

pos_label_vs_i.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to suru verb - included entries

pos_label_vs_s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to suru verb - special class entries

pos_label_vt.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to transitive verb entries

pos_label_vz.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Ichidan verb - zuru verb (alternative form of -jiru verbs) entries

ref_label_jlpt.description: The label used when presenting the level the kanji appears in in the old JLPT system

ref_label_kk.description: The label used when presenting Kanji Kentei levels

ref_label_nelson_r.description: The label used when presenting Nelson's revised radical numbers. This should generally be a label that will sort directly after ref_label_radical when using String.localCompare.

ref_label_py.description: The label used when present the Pinyin reading

ref_label_radical.description: The label used when presenting radical numbers

ref_label_unicode.description: The label used when presenting the Unicode codepoint of the kanji

tabs_kanji_label.description: The label for the kanji dictionary tab

tabs_names_label.description: The label for the names dictionary tab

tabs_words_label.description: The label for the words dictionary tab
